title: WTB: T215 Red Cross and T209-1 Color Series
author: packs

posts.post_title: WTB: T215 Red Cross and T209-1 Color Series
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

I'm looking to pick up a T215 Red Cross in the SGC or PSA 2 to 4 range. Would consider a 1.5 too as long as there isn't back damage to the card.

I'm also looking to pick up a T209-1 Color Series in the 2 to 5 range. 

If any of you collectors have any examples for sale please send me an e-mail. 

E-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks.

I have a nice T209-1 Color of Walsh currently available on my website...

[url]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/tobacco.html[/url]

email me at [url]rhettyeakley@netzero.com[/url] if there is interest

-Rhett
